mapper.insert: insert into members (member_id, member_pwd, member_name, member_tel, join_date, member_mileage) values (#{member_id}, #{member_pwd}, #{member_name}, #{member_tel}, sysdate, 1000)
mapper.select: select member_id from members where member_id = #{member_id}
select member_tel from members where member_tel = #{member_tel}
select count(*) from members where member_id= #{member_id} and member_pwd= #{member_pwd}
select member_id from members where member_name= #{member_name} and member_tel=#{member_tel}
select count(*) from members where member_id= #{member_id} and member_tel=#{member_tel}
mapper.update: update members set member_pwd = #{member_pwd} where member_id = #{member_id}
update members set member_mileage = member_mileage - #{order_usemileage} where member_id = #{member_id}
update members set member_mileage = member_mileage + #{order_plusmileage} where member_id = #{member_id}
